Sir Shina Peters (amụrụ ya na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri atọ nke ọnwa Mee n'afo 1958) bụ onye egwu Jùjú nke Naijiria.

A mụrụ Oluwashina Akanbi Peters na Ogun State, ọrụ Peters n'egwú malitere mgbe ọ dị obere mgbe ya na ndị enyi ya kụrụ egwu n"okpuru Olushina na ụmụnne ya iri na abụọ. Mgbe ya na ndị enyi ya nọ na-egwuri egwu, ọ kụziiri onwe ya otu esi akpọ piano ma mesịa sonye n'òtù Ebenezer Obey
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ hapụrụ òtù Obey wee sonye n'òtù General Prince Adekunle dị ka onye na-akpọ ụbọ
Ndị otu Adekunle na-egwuri egwu na họtel Lagos dị ka Western Hotel, Palm Beach Hotel na Executive Hotel
Mgbe Adekunle na-arịa ọrịa, oge ụfọdụ Peter na -agu egwu: Ọ hapụrụ Adekunle iji guzobe Shina Adewale, otu egwu ya na Segun Adegale. Otú ọ dị, ha abụọ kewara n'oge na-adịghị anya
Mgbe Shina Peter  na Segun Adewale weputachara ọtụtụ abọm n'ime afọ 1980, ọ gara n"ihu guzobe otu egwu nke ya, "Sir Shina Petersburg & His International Stars".
Peters bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na 'Money Power', ihe ngosi nke Ola Balogun mepụtara
Ọ zutere ma malite mmekọrịta ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Clarion Chukwura n'oge a
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere nwa nwoke, Clarence Peters.
Sir Shina Peters na ndị egwu ya bụ International Stars wepụtara abọm mbụ ha Ace (Afro-Juju Series 1) n'afọ 1989
Abọm ahụ, nke e wepụtara n'okpuru CBS Records nke Naịjirịa, gara platinum okpukpu abụọ
"Ace," nke Laolu Akins mepụtara, bụ ngwakọta egwu dị n'etiti Juju na Afrobeat

Ụdị egwu Afro juju na-agwakọta ngwa ngwa na iji keyboard eletrọniki, saxophone na guitar. Ụfọdụ n'ime okwu ndị dị na abọm ahụ karịsịa na 'Ijo Shina' dị oke egwu n' oge ahụ. Abọm ahụ gara n'ihu nwetalu Peter ihe onyinye nke gụnyere onye na-ese ihe na abọm nke Afọ na Naịjiria Musical Awards. Ọ sochiri 'Ace' na 'Shinamania'; abọm ahụ nwere egwu dịka 'Oluwa Yo Pese', 'Omo Bo' da 'Give Our Women Chance'
Sir Shina Peters nwere abom iri na isii e wepụtara na aha ya
